text: [upbeat music]
[cheering]
LOS and LES.

Ready for your first
Bobby The Myth concert?
As the kids say, I am amped.
[screaming]

Must destroy
human festivities.
[lasers firing]
Not on my watch.
LOS, hit me with the deets.

Scan indicates he
is a gamma droid,

an evil android programmed by
the Mad Thinker to cause chaos.

Then I guess we'll just have
to change his programming.
Come on, LOS.
We got some coding to do.

Wait, Lu, don't you need
your Moon Girl get up?

Casey, you don't need
to be a superhero to code.

(SINGING) This villainous
robot is a complex machine

And this fest is a mess because
it's programmed to be mean

If we want to stop this
evil bot's mad destruction

We need to rewrite
his bad instructions

To give this computer
a new set of commands

I need to speak a language
that computers understand
This one's using Java
But there's tons you can run

And these languages break
down into zeros and ones

LOS: Now hacking into
gamma droid software.
[screams]

(SINGING) It's time to crack
the code to defeat our enemy
So I'm searching through his RAM
That's his data memory
There it is

That's the code
making this bot rude

Let's delete it quick to
give him a better attitude
This droid wasn't built all bad
So let's give him a chance

And enter some new code to
not destroy but to dance
Must enjoy human festivities.
(SINGING) Get with the program
You can do it too
Put your mind to it
There is so much you can do
Get with the program
There's nothing to fear
Use your brain to fight
You can be a hero
